title: Rough Sketch
description: Smart, successful, and sitting pretty at the top of her game, Neera Malik has it all figured out.Save for the small issue of Gustavo Guillmand.The artist with a cult—and Instagram—following has a problem and it’s not his preference for shirtless selfies.No, he has an attitude problem, a minding his own business problem, an infuriatingly sexy problem.They can’t stand each other and they can’t stay away from each other.
author: Kate Canterbary
